Sql.query: INSERT INTO gmm_garantia ( garacodi, garafecinicio, garafecfin, garamontogarantia, garaarchivo, garaestado, garausucreacion, garafeccreacion, garausumodificacion, garafecmodificacion, tcercodi, tmodcodi, empgcodi ) VALUES ( :garacodi, to_date(:garafecinicio,'yyyy-mm-dd'), to_date(:garafecfin,'yyyy-mm-dd'), :garamontogarantia, :garaarchivo, :garaestado, :garausucreacion, sysdate, -- fecha actua l null, -- :garausumodificacion, null, -- :garafecmodificacion, :tcercodi, :tmodcodi, :empgcodi )

UPDATE gmm_garantia SET garafecinicio = to_date(:garafecinicio,'yyyy-mm-dd'), garafecfin = to_date(:garafecfin,'yyyy-mm-dd'), garamontogarantia = :garamontogarantia, garaarchivo = :garaarchivo, tcercodi = :tcercodi, tmodcodi = :tmodcodi, garaestado = :garaestado, garausumodificacion =:garausumodificacion, garafecmodificacion = sysdate WHERE garacodi =:garacodi
UPDATE gmm_garantia SET garaestado = '0', garausumodificacion =:garausumodificacion, garafecmodificacion = sysdate WHERE garacodi =:garacodi
select * from gmm_garantia where empgcodi = {0} and garaestado='1'

select pericodi, perimsjpaso1 as mensaje1, perimsjpaso2 as mensaje2, perimsjpaso3 as mensaje3, (select DCALVALOR from gmm_datcalculo where PERICODI = per.PERICODI and TINSCODI = 'TCAMBIO') as TCAMBIO, (select DCALVALOR from gmm_datcalculo where PERICODI = per.PERICODI and TINSCODI = 'SSCC') as SSCC, (select DCALVALOR from gmm_datcalculo where PERICODI = per.PERICODI and TINSCODI = 'MRESERVA') as MRESERVA, (select DCALVALOR from gmm_datcalculo where PERICODI = per.PERICODI and TINSCODI = 'TINFLEX') as TINFLEX, (select DCALVALOR from gmm_datcalculo where PERICODI = per.PERICODI and TINSCODI = 'TEXCESO') as TEXCESO from gmm_periodo per where perianio = {0} AND perimes = {1}

select per.pericodi, ge.empgcodi, se.emprcodi, se.emprnomb AS EMPRESA, per.perimsjpaso1 as mensaje1, per.perimsjpaso2 as mensaje2, per.perimsjpaso3 as mensaje3, dat1.DCALVALOR as TCAMBIO, dat2.DCALVALOR AS SSCC, dat3.DCALVALOR as MRESERVA, dat4.DCALVALOR as TINFLEX, dat5.DCALVALOR as TEXCESO from gmm_periodo per LEFT JOIN gmm_datcalculo dat1 ON (dat1.PERICODI = per.PERICODI and dat1.TINSCODI = 'TCAMBIO' and dat1.DATCALESTADO = '1') LEFT JOIN gmm_datcalculo dat2 ON (dat2.PERICODI = per.PERICODI and dat2.TINSCODI = 'SSCC' and dat2.DATCALESTADO ='1') LEFT JOIN gmm_datcalculo dat3 ON (dat3.PERICODI = per.PERICODI and dat3.TINSCODI = 'MRESERVA' and dat3.DATCALESTADO = '1') LEFT JOIN gmm_datcalculo dat4 ON (dat4.PERICODI = per.PERICODI and dat4.TINSCODI = 'TINFLEX' and dat4.DATCALESTADO='1') LEFT JOIN gmm_datcalculo dat5 ON (dat5.PERICODI = per.PERICODI and dat5.TINSCODI = 'TEXCESO' and dat5.DATCALESTADO='1') INNER JOIN gmm_empresa ge on (dat2.empgcodi= ge.empgcodi and dat3.empgcodi= ge.empgcodi and dat4.empgcodi= ge.empgcodi and dat5.empgcodi= ge.empgcodi) INNER JOIN SI_EMPRESA se on (ge.emprcodi = se.emprcodi) where perianio = {0} AND perimes = {1}
